commits.author: Paul Chaignon
commits.summary: Avoid using the ambiguous \h shorthand character
commits.body:
Depending on the regular expression engine used, \h does not always
mean the same. With a PCRE engine, it matches white spaces, whereas,
with a Oniguruma engine, it matches hexademical digit characters.
Atom uses an Oniguruma engine, but github.com relies on a PCRE
engine.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Update platform symbols using the macOS 10.12 SDK

commits.author: Yuki Izumi
commits.body:
It's often misleading (I have plenty of lone %s in strings), and only the
compiler knows when it's right to complain about an actual format
string with a bad placeholder.
